hero.subtitle: The B2B procurement platform that aggregates purchase orders to deliver volume discounts to businesses of all sizes. Save 20-40% on every order.
hero.trusted: Trusted by SMEs and enterprises across industries

features.title: Built for B2B Procurement Excellence
features.subtitle: A win-win marketplace connecting buyers and suppliers through Cooperative Procurementing campaigns. Better prices for buyers, predictable orders for suppliers.

volumeDiscounts.title: Volume Discounts
volumeDiscounts.description: Access enterprise-level pricing through collective buying power. Save 20-40% on purchases that would otherwise be out of reach.

securePayments.title: Secure Payments
securePayments.description: Payment intents protect all parties. Funds are only charged when campaigns successfully complete their targets.

transparentPricing.title: Transparent Pricing
transparentPricing.description: See exactly how volume affects pricing with tiered price brackets. Know your discount before you commit.

aggregatePurchaseOrders.title: Aggregate Purchase Orders
aggregatePurchaseOrders.description: Multiple buyers consolidated into single purchase orders. Suppliers get predictable, large-volume orders.

fulfillment.title: 60-Day Fulfillment
fulfillment.description: Guaranteed fulfillment within 60 days of campaign completion. Certainty for both buyers and suppliers.

verifiedOrganizations.title: Verified Organizations
verifiedOrganizations.description: Admin verification ensures only legitimate businesses participate. Trade with confidence on a trusted platform.

howItWorks.title: How Cooperative Procurement Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple, transparent process that delivers volume discounts to businesses of all sizes through collective purchasing power.

step1.title: Suppliers Launch Campaigns
step1.description: Suppliers create campaigns with tiered pricing. The more organizations join, the bigger the discount for everyone.

step2.title: Buyers Join and Pledge
step2.description: Browse active campaigns and commit to the quantities your organization needs. Watch real-time progress toward volume targets.

step3.title: Target Met, Campaign Locks
step3.description: When the target quantity is reached, the campaign locks in the best price tier. All participants get the volume discount.

step4.title: Fulfillment Within 60 Days
step4.description: Orders are processed and fulfilled within 60 days. Secure payments are collected only after campaign success.

pricing.title: Aligned Incentives, Zero Risk
pricing.subtitle: Free to join, free to launch. We only succeed when you save. Our platform fee is a small percentage of the discounts achieved.

buyers.name: For Buyers
buyers.description: SMEs and enterprises seeking cost savings

testimonials.title: Trusted by Buyers and Suppliers
testimonials.subtitle: See how businesses are saving on procurement and suppliers are growing their volume through cooperative procurementing campaigns.

testimonial1.quote: We saved 35% on our office supplies procurement by joining group campaigns. As a mid-sized company, we never had access to these volume discounts before.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Chen

testimonial2.quote: Mashrook gave us predictable, large-volume orders that transformed our sales pipeline. The consolidated purchase orders make fulfillment seamless.
testimonial2.author: Marcus Rodriguez

testimonial3.quote: The transparent tiered pricing let us plan our budget accurately. We knew exactly what discount we'd get once the campaign reached its target.
testimonial3.author: Emily Watson
